name: Random Tactics Advance
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for the 2022 GMTK jam. We decided to try a type of game that we had never programmed before, and it turned out to be a pretty ambitious undertaking. The game has a few bugs here and there, but overall we're really proud of what we managed to accomplish in such a short time. We hope you enjoy playing it as much as we enjoyed making it!

-Credits-

A game by 

James and Michael

Trujillo
